title: Accept/Decline screen not transferring in to champ select
body:
I've just had a bug where I clicked accept to a game however it did not take me in to the champ select screen.

I've received a 5 minute ban and LP loss. Not the end of the world but a bit of a pain considering it will be the difference between making promos or not now.

I've checked and it appears this bug was reported in May. Just wanted to show visiblity to it again.

replies.body:
It's a (very intermittent) issue that's been lingering but doesn't seem to occur with any kind of consistency or frequency. If it happens more than once, run a client repair, and if that fails a clean reinstall with the Hextech Repair Tool.

If all else fails, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
